author: Carl Bildt
title: Trump’s Nuclear Fool’s Gold
description: By triggering an expensive and destabilizing strategic arms race, US President Donald Trump's proposed "Golden Dome" will not necessarily render America any safer from nuclear attack. As decades of maintaining relative peace through "mutual assured destructio…
